virtual-sensor.name: Thur_Dozer_NodeHealth__chart1
virtual-sensor.description: backlog health status at Thur deployment

address.predicate: select timed, POSITION, GENERATION_TIME, TEMPERATURE from Thur_Dozer_NodeHealth__conv

source.query: select GENERATION_TIME, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 1, TEMPERATURE, null) as p1, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 2, TEMPERATURE, null) as p2, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 3, TEMPERATURE, null) as p3, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 4, TEMPERATURE, null) as p4, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 5, TEMPERATURE, null) as p5, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 6, TEMPERATURE, null) as p6 from wrapper where GENERATION_TIME >= (DATEDIFF(second, '1970-01-01', NOW()) * 1000) - 86400000
